DocAttribute.Name: BasisCurve
DocAttribute.Documentation: The curve that is being offset.

DocAttribute.Name: Distance
DocAttribute.Documentation: The distance of the offset curve from the basis curve. The distance may be positive, negative or zero.

DocAttribute.Name: SelfIntersect
DocAttribute.Documentation: An indication of whether the offset curve self-intersects, this is for information only.

DocAttribute.Name: RefDirection
DocAttribute.Documentation: The direction used to define the direction of the offset curve 3d from the basis curve.

DocWhereRule.Name: DimIs2D
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The underlying curve shall be defined in three-dimensional space.
